channel.title: Beego on 好奇心是探索未知世界的钥匙
channel.description: Recent content in Beego on 好奇心是探索未知世界的钥匙

item.title: Beego开发入门
item.description: 安装 安装beego： $ go get github.com/astaxie/beego 安装bee开发工具： $ go get github.com/beego/bee $ bee Bee is a Fast and Flexible tool for managing your Beego Web Application. USAGE bee command [arguments] AVAILABLE COMMANDS version Prints the current Bee version migrate Runs database migrations api Creates a Beego API application bale Transforms non-Go files to Go source files fix Fixes your application by making it compatible with newer versions of Beego dlv Start a debugging session using Delve dockerize Generates a Dockerfile for your Beego application generate Source code generator hprose Creates an RPC application based on Hprose and Beego frameworks new Creates a Beego application pack Compresses a Beego application into a single file rs Run customized scripts run Run the application by starting a local development server server serving static content over HTTP on port Use bee help [command] for more information about a command.
